documents.document: @JordynMihell that is an A+ tea towel
@Tegal1234 what's wrong with early Friday mornings? Picky.
@Tegal1234 yeah but who cares about you? Haha I kid.
@Tegal1234 Watching two in a row without having to travel?
@NZ_Dave It's all about me 💃🏼💃🏼💃🏼
@NZ_Dave after the games now too. But that's just thinking about myself haha
@NZ_Dave Possibly. Crowds were certainly better at the "curtain raiser" games last year. It'll be nice to be able to enjoy a couple of beers
@NZ_Dave I have zero idea if this is the case though
@NZ_Dave Are they not effectively curtain raisers like the Saturday games they played last year? Those were great for crowds too
@patrick478 @yomcat @Wimble_Wombat @gingereejit @AliceCooke3 Can I grab a couple of those cards for home use?
This is the greatest news. Really looking forward to these games being on a Saturday https://t.co/fi6bTdJUyK
@sez_sez That's quite a good result to be fair!
Garage Project coming out in the same day to show how things can be done. Incredible.
@d_m_ab hah! The sellouts are still by far my best local. They won't be losing me from there anytime soon!
@d_m_ab craft brewers rather than putting more money towards Lion Red haha
@d_m_ab Yeah but they're still owned by Lion now aren't they? Don't get me wrong, the beers still good but I prefer supporting the small
@KloppGoff @SWTGallagher Do they have prices yet? The others of these I've seen tend to be pretty pricey. I want to get into one for sure
@d_m_ab Not at all.. they're owned by a massive brewery. They don't meet the craft brewery label by any stretch.
@d_m_ab beers than anyone with peak creativity
@d_m_ab I love Emersons but I'd hardly call them a craft brewer. Look at Garage, they're outdoing anyone themselves and putting out more
@SWTGallagher @KloppGoff I'd love it... I just know how shit I'd be. Chemistry is way over my head haha
@SWTGallagher Yep 100% agree. The proof is there it can be done without selling out to the big brewers too. More crafts the merrier
@d_m_ab and it's not pumping out the extensive numbers of their basic beers like other "craft" breweries under big brewery ownership
@d_m_ab Nothing to do with making money.It's about the product. I'm just a bigger fan of craft breweries focusing on what makes them awesome
@KloppGoff Some of those are on the dodgy side...
@KloppGoff what's that about? Didn't see that
@KloppGoff The Third Eye is my best local too so I certainly won't be running away from there any time soon!
@KloppGoff Beer. I wouldn't turn down a Macs on a hot day but would prefer to support the local crafts providing the creative goods
@KloppGoff they've got be careful and ease into these big changes. Having to focus on the bigger output. Doesn't mean they won't make good
@Tegal1234 @KloppGoff @patrick478 Nothing hipster about it. It's good to support locals providing the goods.
@SWTGallagher the good news is there's more and more small brewers stepping up. This will put them towards the craft levels of Macs Brewery
@KloppGoff @Tegal1234 @patrick478 A big part of the appeal is also supporting a local craft brewer. Not big batch brewing. Disappointing
@SWTGallagher completely. A big reason is wanting to support the local brewers.
@jessej1977 At what point does it stop being a craft brewer though? Curious about that
@Tegal1234 @patrick478 After being bought out by BK. They always say it will but it never does. Perfect example there. Money rules.
@Tegal1234 @patrick478 What makes you think the beer stays the same? Big brewing. It's like expecting that Hell Pizza would stay the same
@SmithyInWelly Haha wouldn't have been bad being able to enjoy a few more qualities beverages off the back of the truck
@patrick478 At what point do they stop being "craft" breweries? At least Garage have committed to doing it themselves
@SmithyInWelly not in the literal sense of being dirty
Not sure how I feel about this trend of small local craft breweries being bought up by the big dirty breweries.
Watching this won't get old. A big thunder kick is great and all but this is pure skill and magical to watch. https://t.co/4gXiWULjhQ
Weekly episodes?! What is this the 90's? My lack of self control will no longer be an issue. https://t.co/ubVeECXefM
Shamefully enjoying the nostalgia drenched yet completely non-wholesome first episode of Riverdale.
@yomcat But then bizarrely it doesn't apply to private places so bar and trains tend to have smoking areas which isn't so great
@yomcat small enclosed smoking areas hiding them from view and the smoke from the public. It's incredibly well done
@WgtnCC you guys are bloody rocking it, superb work!
@yomcat Tokyo manages to pull it off pretty well.
Great move! Can't wait until all public spaces are the same. https://t.co/xRGaaQ9l0a
Hope they don't start me off with something like a Pig. Straight to the top I say. Gimmie Bears, Lions and Cheetahs!
Off to the zoo to talk with the animals. Hugely excited for my debut Zoo Chat.
@CarylDavies1 Who's that? Youth team player?

Enter the gym dropping the contents of my wallet everywhere. Receptionist: How's your day going?
I think we've established it's not great!
I'd honestly love a count of how many replies of "Snakes on a Plane" this tweet received. https://t.co/8H04DPEmDk
It's not me making you sound like that 💃🏼💃🏼💃🏼 https://t.co/t7bd7untGD
She strikes again with another pearler. Today @JordynMihell assures me that this is real. 100% serious too. https://t.co/HXpB3rzwFM
Who? https://t.co/XmfVVhnkc9
@jojokempson How do they add that time on and not question it? It would be funny if it wasn't so dangerous.
It's so hot we need multiple drinks breaks so obviously intelligent choices say to add on another 7mins. #ADLvWEL
Kicking and breaking the corner flag while hallucinating in the heat. #JustALeagueThings #ADLvWEL
@ClarkeBoswell Plenty of CCTV around the Cuba street area, hopefully it's been caught on camera. So pointless for a now bricked iPhone
@charliecPIM Ah. That makes sense then!
@Yakcall I respect that
Where's Rossi? #ADLvWEL
@Yakcall The wack to the head and concussion has limited an exact location unfortunately
@Yakcall Somewhere between Munchen and Abel Smith Street. Last memories were leaving the others he was with and heading up Cuba st
@ClarkeBoswell @Yakcall Yep, would say sevens makes it ripe pickings for easy targets too
@This_Is_Alexis_ Not great sadly. Bruised ego more than anything I'd say
Is that Dura trying to signal for a drinks break to the linesman? #ADLvWEL
@Yakcall Hopefully the CCTV is of use, if the police actually decide to make use of it. Looks like a quick smash and grab
@This_Is_Alexis_ Bit of a mess, crack in the bone behind his ear, chipped elbow and badly bruised thigh. All the took was a phone...
@Yakcall Not ideal. Crack in the bone behind his ear, chipped elbow and badly bruised thigh. Bit of a shambles. All they took was a phone.
Nothing like your brother getting mugged to remind you Wellington isn't the safe place we all wish it was. Guarantee no one will get caught.
@ClarkeBoswell you can just see the pace slow right down. Wouldn't blame them for anything tonight
We already look completley knackered. Why do they continue to play games in this ridiculous heat? #ADLvWEL
Must be an awesome day to work for Spark.
@pineyzb Small club syndrome?
It's a bizarre thing watching United fans cracking off at Liverpool. A team that sits a good couple of spots above them in the league 🤔
@AliceCooke3 @chrisguzzwell It's serious business.
@chrisguzzwell i used a bit of a hybrid between two recipes, mostly this one though https://t.co/HKNsrpOAFa highly recommend them
@chrisguzzwell I was a bit nervous about them but they were pretty easy. Really nice dough to make then an easy quick steam
@JordynMihell wow you should totes use it more often it's really neat!
@JordynMihell wow is that a new filter?

Round 4: I've come out punching.

@AdamRyan The view was TIGHT
